Welcome to Zekyl

04 Jun 2013

Demos of static file generators.

Minimal: zen-like

  • yaml: bonsai
  • git: toto

Just right: custom blogs

  • ruby: jekyll
  • python: felix felicis
  • javascript/node: nico
  • scala: monkeyman
  • haskell: hakyll
  • clojure: misaki

Fullstack: lightweight cms

  • ruby/sinatra: middleman
  • python/django: hyde
  • python: sphinx
